FuncDef:
The description command configures a bridge domain (BD) description.
The undo description command deletes a description of a bridge domain. The description command configures a bridge domain (BD) description. The undo description command deletes a description of a bridge domain. By default, no bridge domain description is configured. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a bridge domain description.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo: If you have run the bridge-domain command to configure multiple BDs to transmit different services, run the description command in the corresponding BD view to configure a description for the BD. The description of a BD helps you quickly understand the function of the BD, facilitating service management.
